awurudu dolahakatath wadiya dirgha kala wakawanuwaka patan jathika nalikawen diga harena ‘sitha niwana katha’ osse mewara sambudu themangula samarana wesak pun poho dina diga harenne ekasiya ekolos (111) wana kathangayayi.telinatya kalawe sammananiya nirmanakaruwaku men ma chithrapata adhyakshawarayaku lesath kalak puwathpath kalawediyeku lesath siya kala jiwithaya arthawath karagath ohuge nirmana adhyakshanayen ‘sitha niwana katha’ telinatya malawa posath.
kanna dena eka mata dapu nama madin thiyagaththa.
